description: Recurring pattern of configuration error affecting Wireless services. Observed 132 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Filing a "Notice of Dispute"; agents can sometimes apply a 12-month credit to offset the increase if the user is on a legacy 3-year lock.

description: Recurring pattern of configuration error affecting Fios services. Observed 49 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: "Retention Team" manual override; verify if the discount was "Limited Time" vs "Lifetime" in original contract notes.

description: Recurring pattern of hardware failure affecting Wireless services. Observed 12 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Whitelist short-code 225-999; Tech support must "Re-sync SMS Gateway" for the primary account holder's line.

description: Recurring pattern of esim provisioning issue affecting Wireless services. Observed 8 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Identity verification via in-store government ID; Fraud Department must "Clear the Security Flag" to restore automated provisioning.

description: Recurring pattern of network settings affecting Wireless services. Observed 7 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Check "Data Limit" in Android settings; Reset Network.

description: Recurring pattern of splitter issue affecting Fios services. Observed 7 times with Critical severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Replace coax splitters with 1675MHz-rated units; ensure MoCA Privacy is disabled on the primary router if using 3rd party extenders.

description: Recurring pattern of network configuration affecting Wireless services. Observed 7 times with High severity.
recommended_action: Check Plan features (Starter Unlimited has no hotspot).

description: Recurring pattern of tower congestion affecting Wireless services. Observed 7 times with High severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Move Gateway to a tower with "Lower Utilization"; check for "Sector Congestion" via a Network Repair Bureau (NRB) ticket.

description: Recurring pattern of cache corruption affecting Wireless services. Observed 6 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Clear browser cache; "Unlink" and "Relink" the accounts under a new primary email address to force a fresh database sync.

description: Recurring pattern of hardware failure affecting Fios services. Observed 3 times with Critical severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Technical support must "Break the Lease" manually; ONT hardware replacement required if the "Data" light remains off after reboot.

description: Recurring pattern of ip lease issue affecting Fios services. Observed 2 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Power Cycle ONT; Release/Renew WAN IP lease.

description: Recurring pattern of hardware failure affecting HomeInternet services. Observed 2 times with Low severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Relocate gateway away from windows; use an external USB fan for active cooling; check for firmware update for thermal management.

description: Recurring pattern of software bug affecting 5GInfrastructure services. Observed 2 times with High severity.
recommended_action: Res.: Update to the latest OS-level carrier bundle (e.g., VZW 58.0+); requires back-end "Feature Add" for 5G SA on the line profile.
